last_episode_to_air.name: Race
last_episode_to_air.overview: It's a race to the finish as the friends try to outrun Team B. And when the final boss strikes, they'll have to work together to win.

name: The Hollow
overview: Three teens join forces to find a way home after waking up in a strange realm filled with magic portals, perplexing puzzles and vicious beasts.

episodes.name: The Room
episodes.overview: Disoriented teens Adam, Mira and Kai are strangers who wake up in a room with no doors or windows. How did they get there? And how will they escape?

episodes.name: The Desert
episodes.overview: Captured by Minotaurs and imprisoned in a labyrinth, the teens face a grisly fate: becoming dinner for a snot-spewing monster.

episodes.name: Apocalypse
episodes.overview: The kids meet the Four Horsemen of the Apocalypse. While Mira tries to help Death's sick steed, Kai puts his mechanical skills to work.

episodes.name: The Lighthouse
episodes.overview: Adam, Mira and Kai spy a lighthouse and send out a distress signal -- only to stumble into a bizarre new world inhabited by a mysterious being.

episodes.name: Ishibo
episodes.overview: On a mission to find the Ishibo, Adam battles a fearsome demon monk. Kai's cry for help summons That Weird Guy, who delivers a warning.

episodes.name: Undead
episodes.overview: The friends wander into a spooky ghost town, but they soon realize they're not alone. Can they trust their new acquaintances?

episodes.name: The Riddle
episodes.overview: Separated from Kai and the others, Mira and Adam must solve an old man's riddle. Adam thinks he's spotted a clue about where they are.

episodes.name: Ice
episodes.overview: After battling an ice monster, Adam, Kai and Mira weigh whether to help the other kids, then find themselves stranded at sea.

episodes.name: Cocoon
episodes.overview: The friends land on an island overrun with mutant spider-people. Adam needs help, and their time is quickly running out.

episodes.name: Colrath
episodes.overview: Adam, Mira and Kai dodge old enemies as they race to find the tree and discover that a powerful foe guards their next destination.

episodes.name: Home
episodes.overview: After discovering the truth behind the Hollow, friends Adam, Mira and Kai awaken in their real-life world. But something's not right.

episodes.name: Hollow Games
episodes.overview: The friends team up to face their biggest fears. But they still need answers — and Mira decides to take matters into her own hands.

episodes.name: The Return
episodes.overview: Adam and Kai land in a new version of the Hollow and search for Mira in a creepy castle, where a gnome's riddle gives them a clue.

episodes.name: Puzzled
episodes.overview: In a strange world filled with shifting shapes, the friends face a puzzling villain, then test their luck on a high-stakes game show.

episodes.name: Alchemy
episodes.overview: Adam, Mira and Kai deal with a difficult loss, but their search for answers continues. At a scientist's chateau, they tangle with some old rivals.

episodes.name: Dead End
episodes.overview: On the hunt for Weirdy, the friends take a ghost train to a jazz club. But Adam and Reeve's arguing threatens their mission.

episodes.name: Unbalanced
episodes.overview: The tension between Reeve and Adam reaches a tipping point, sending them plunging into the ocean — where a hungry sea monster awaits.

episodes.name: Fang
episodes.overview: After battling the sea monster with Brynhilda, the friends arrive in a fairy-tale land, where three pixies lead them to Weirdy.

episodes.name: Fire
episodes.overview: Vanessa's confession upsets her friends. Determined to make it up to them, she sneaks off on her own to find the other team.

episodes.name: Race
episodes.overview: It's a race to the finish as the friends try to outrun Team B. And when the final boss strikes, they'll have to work together to win.
